name: Dont Drop The Ball
description:
OVERVIEW

Procedurally generated 2D Platformer developed for the Weekly GameJam #18 - Dont Drop it. Your life goal as Captain Cube is to never drop the ball but a giant black wall looks to ruin your life goals, run as far as you can before dropping your precious ball. Your scored based on how long you are able to not drop the ball.

CONTROLS

A and D = Left and Right

Space = Jump

Space + Space = Double Jump

Arrow Keys Left + Right = Rotate Captain Cube left and right

CREDITS

Background art created by Liz Molnar available @ https://raventale.itch.io/parallax-background

Soundtrack created by AbstractionMusic, find his stuff at http://abstractionmusic.com/
